select SEQ_prod_no.nextval from dual
insert into product values( #{prod_no}, #{sell_no}, #{prod_cate}, #{event_cate}, #{prod_name}, #{prod_price}, #{prod_brand}, #{prod_desc}, #{prod_from}, #{prod_wash}, #{prod_qual}, #{prod_detail}, #{prod_detail_img_name}, #{prod_detail_img_savename}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT p.sell_no, p.prod_no, i.prod_no, p.event_cate, p.prod_name, p.prod_brand, p.prod_price, to_char(p.prod_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') prod_date, i.prod_img_no, i.prod_img_savename, i.prod_img_type FROM product p, prodimg i where p.prod_no = i.prod_no and i.prod_img_type = 'main' and sell_no = #{sell_no} order by prod_date asc

select prod_no, prod_cate, event_cate, prod_name, prod_price, prod_brand, prod_desc, prod_from, prod_wash, prod_qual, prod_detail, prod_detail_img_name, prod_detail_img_savename from product where prod_no = #{prod_no}
SELECT prod_no, colorsize_no, color, prod_size, stock FROM colorsize where prod_no = #{prod_no}
select prod_no, prod_img_no, prod_img_name, prod_img_savename from prodimg where prod_no = #{prod_no}

select bp.buy_del_state, bp.buyprod_no, bp.buy_no, b.buy_price, to_char(b.buy_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') buy_date, bp.buyprod_price, bp.buy_delivery, bp.buy_del_no, p.prod_no, p.prod_brand, p.prod_name, p.prod_cate, p.sell_no, c.color, c.prod_size, bp.count, i.prod_img_savename, i.prod_img_type from buyproduct bp, buy b, product p, colorsize c, prodimg i where bp.buy_no = b.buy_no and bp.prod_no = p.prod_no and bp.colorsize_no = c.colorsize_no and bp.prod_no = i.prod_no and i.prod_img_type = 'main' and sell_no = #{sell_no} order by b.buy_date desc, buy_no desc

select bp.buy_del_state, bp.buyprod_no, bp.buy_no, b.buy_price, to_char(b.buy_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') buy_date, b.buy_name, b.buy_address, b.buy_ph, bp.buyprod_price, bp.buy_delivery, bp.buy_del_no, p.prod_no, p.prod_brand, p.prod_name, p.prod_cate, p.sell_no, c.color, c.prod_size, bp.count, i.prod_img_savename, i.prod_img_type from buyproduct bp, buy b, product p, colorsize c, prodimg i where bp.buy_no = b.buy_no and bp.prod_no = p.prod_no and bp.colorsize_no = c.colorsize_no and bp.prod_no = i.prod_no and i.prod_img_type = 'main' and p.sell_no = #{sell_no} and b.buy_no = #{buy_no}
